mdRecord.dcterms:title: Digital sphygmomanometer
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: COPAL [manufacturer]

mdRecord.dcterms:medium: plastic (organic material); fabric; paper (fiber product); metal [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Copal (brand) digital sphygmomanometer UA-251; includes device, arm cuff, rubber hose, plastic case, and instruction manual.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
